TopicTitle: Aircrafts of ver. 1.0.5 or higher are welcome to post here!

Articles.Content:
[B]So i thought i would start a new thread since this forum has so many versions blended in (hope you won't mind).

My first airplane was a concept airplane that i made up, it does not handle very well to be honest but it looks damn kuhl[/B]:cool:[B]!
I named it Northopp ([/B][U][B]Note that its not Northrop)
[/B][/U][B]Maestro for fun ofc!
(Sorry for the large images, i have 3 monitors...)[/B][RIGHT][imgur]HpkVF[/imgur][/RIGHT]
[B]Actions group: 1 retract all flaps, 2 extend all flaps (they don't really help much[/B]:P[B])
[/B]
[URL="http://www./download/hqgama5sordiux2/Northopp+Maestro.craft"][B]Northrop Maestro[/B][/URL]

[B]I thought i could as well post my Airbus A340-600 because this is my forum[/B]:sticktongue:

[B]This was first a Boeing 787 but it looked so bad so i decided to make it a little longer and with a little more power,
this was converted from 1.0.4 to 1.0.5 when the new engines came out.
This flies like a dream though, but them wheels tend to wobble and i can't seem to fix it, just take off a little bid earlier[/B]:D
[B](Pictures are still large... Imgur didn't feel so well today so i couldn't upload all photos)
[/B]
[B]Action groups: 1 retract all flaps, 2 flaps group 1, 2 flaps group 2, 4 flaps group 3, 5 reverse thrust


[/B][RIGHT]
[imgur]zJvcW[/imgur][/RIGHT]
[URL="http://www./download/6dcbj3s93sp7ins/Airbus+A340-600.craft"][B]
Airbus a340-600[/B][/URL] Edited November 24, 2015 by Peuxy
